item.title: By: Phil Randolph

item.description: <p>Congratulations Matt! You always have some great information to share!</p><p>Keep it up! <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$FILE/biggrin.gif"</a>> </p>

item.title: By: Ben Poole
item.dc:creator: Ben Poole
item.description: <p>Congrats: keep it up! Nothing wrong with *just* 830 posts: I'll take quality over quantity any day <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$FILE/wink.gif"</a>></p>
item.content:encoded: Congrats: keep it up! Nothing wrong with *just* 830 posts: I’ll take quality over quantity any day http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$FILE/wink.gif“>

item.title: By: Phillip Deftereos
item.dc:creator: Phillip Deftereos
item.description: <p>Happy Birthday ! Keep up the good work Matt. I am an avid reader of 11tmr and 50wordreview, and I've convinced a few others to regularly read the blogs as well.</p>
item.content:encoded: Happy Birthday ! Keep up the good work Matt. I am an avid reader of 11tmr and 50wordreview, and I’ve convinced a few others to regularly read the blogs as well.
